item.description:
NEW STUFF:
I'm so glad I scheduled this meetup on Saturday -- I need a break! Our book is due to the publisher on Monday, so we're going NuTz trying to finish it up. My eyes are crossing, my shoulders are sore from more hours at my computer than a human should tolerate. I need a movie with my peeps!

SO... the 3D version starts at 8:10 on Saturday night. Let's meet outside the theater doors BY 7:30 so we can buy tickets and treats and grab our seats (why didn't I come up with that little rhyme before now?!). This showing will probably be crowded, considering it's a Saturday night, so if you're late, gimme a call so I can keep the rather largeish group together for the movie. Also, pls keep your RSVP up to date online, so I know who to expect.

Another note: The 3D version will undoubtedly be worth it. And by "it" I mean an extra $3 per ticket. It's the theater -- not me. Sorry! So the total is going to be $11 per ticket (as opposed to $13.25 at the window). The good news is you get to keep the wicked cool 3D glasses.

Hope to see you Saturday!

--Dana
508/308-4897


OLD STUFF:
Who's "Up" for seeing the latest Disney/Pixar movie? Apparently this is the production studio team's first foray into 3D and I hear it's fanTAStic.

SUMMARY:
Carl Fredricksen spent his entire life dreaming of exploring the globe and experiencing life to its fullest. But at age 78, life seems to have passed him by, until a twist of fate (and a persistent 8-year old Junior Wilderness Explorer named Russell) gives him a new lease on life.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update this meetup with a specific time a few days before, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Up in 3D!

--Dana
item.name: Up in 3D
